Mobile Money

SIMLab and DFID bring mobile money to Kenyan businesses and savings collectives. >>

We are SIMLab.

We use inclusive technology to help organizations make systems and services more accessible, responsive, and resilient.

We build projects with partners and donors around the world.

We help organizations navigate the human side of technology.

We develop resources and toolkits to help learning reach everyone.
